Name: Avirup Guha Roy
Title: Jama Masjid
Review: The structure of this Mosque is a blend of both Muslim and Hindu architecture and the entire structure of Jama Masjid stands straight over 260 pillars, which also supports 15-arched domes that are seen at various elevations

Name: Voyager826163
Title: Ignored marvel
Review: The jama masjid lies in the heart of lucknow.although the imambargahz steal all the thunder..jama masjid, an architectural marvel stands ignored.one is allowed inside the mosque only if you wish to offer 'namaz' (pray to Allah)..The architecture of the outside gate is visible for all the rest..

Name: lalani_13
Title: Beautiful masjid
Review: we went there as part of our tour and took some photos also. There were many people there and it is a nice place.

Name: 592abck
Title: Nothing much to see
Review: Nothing much to see here and you are not allowed beyond a particular limit as a visitor. Just like any other mosque.

Name: amars777
Title: Huge and Majestic
Review: This magnificent mosque located near Imambara was built by Muhammed Ali Shah in 1837-42. This is an architectural beauty.

Name: Nandana1
Title: Big Mosque
Review: A old Mosque in Tehseenganj. Entry has some restriction. We watched the beautiful Mosque from outside. Very nice and beautiful architecture.

Name: Aarav K
Title: Juma Masjid
Review: Juma Masjid is a very old and historical building. It's design is very beautiful from outside. Many people come here to pray, it's also a good place to hang around.

Name: JITENDRA Singh
Title: beautiful oldest building
Review: this is the one of the oldest building in lucknow people come here for pray and there is s big space of 100s of people

Name: sid_ups
Title: A beautiful and huge mosque
Review: This Islamic mosque is situated little outside from the Imambara Group, looks very special and historical building

Name: Seema H
Title: Beautiful architecture
Review: The masjid is located in the same complex as the Bara Imambara, but non Muslim's are not welcome here. It is a place of great architecture and immense beauty and can be admired from afar. The gardens around it are well maintained. We took pictures of it from the Bara Imambara

Name: SomnathKhaskel
Title: A must see in Lucknow
Review: Non-muslims are not allowed to enter inside the mosque but allowed on the base.  I am a non-muslim but someone greeed us and said welcome ! at the same time he told us not to go inside. After a few moments another old man came and told us “have you seen he board? You are not allowed here”  !!!! When we said that we know the rule and not entering the mosque – he was not happy but left he place……….. so may be I is a tricky place but we liked the architecture !!! its wonderful !

Name: 810wanderwoman
Title: Non Moslems aren't welcome here.
Review: Lovely to look at from afar and badly in need of repair when you look closely, there is a sign in the front welcoming both Shia and Sunni, but requesting that non-Moslems do not enter.

Name: tafayyaz
Title: Good monumental place for tourist
Review: For Muslim tourist, this place is a must see place. But be careful about some tour guide is not good enough to help you. Day time visit is ok.

Name: Mina N
Title: Imam Bhara place
Review: I loved the ambience and the serenity if this place. It's a very historical site. The gardens are kept to their standards but there is room for improvement. Overall, a nice historical place to visit

Name: krazikams
Title: Massive Towers & Dome
Review: Mughal era-architecture is simple beautiful and the feeling when you enter this place is ethereal. Garden and lawn need maintenance, as people simply destroy the beautiful nature and pluck flowers.

Name: Gauravkhuraana
Title: Nice place good to go in the evening
Review: Good place to take photos. You are not allowed inside the building but it looks great. Go there in the evening

Name: Giri_Mlr
Title: Historical place to Visit
Review: Place is in the campus of Bara Imambhara. People who interest in the history or curious to learn about places should visit. Not very crowded place.One can visit in any season.

Name: Dharmendra S
Title: Good architecture work must see
Review: This masjid is a fine work of good architecture. Grand building and looks very good. Must see. Its only 1 Km from Chok.

Name: Pallavi S
Title: Beautiful Landmark of Lucknow
Review: It is a part of the Bara Imambara Complex and you cannot miss it. It is a huge and imposing building with tall minarets and domes.

Name: anuragbhaumiik
Title: Prayer
Review: Nice place cum quite place. Nice place for winter vacation one day out. It's a sculpture of ancient India.

Name: Atif M
Title: must for history lovers
Review: its very famous mosque in old lucknow. fine work of persian architecture. very popular with locals and tourists.must be visited

Name: MananDhuldhoya
Title: Stunning architecture
Review: So gorgeous to look at from the outside and it makes for a great sight, whether from outside its doors or atop the Bada Imambara.

Name: Aman A
Title: Peaceful
Review: This Masjid is located inside the Bada Imambara gate. The Masjid is a very peaceful place to be while you are visiting the Bada Imambara at Lucknow.

Name: SKBhatiya
Title: Good to Spend a few hours
Review: Once the pride of Lucknow is a good place to visit and spend a few hours, you will find guides willing to show you around, make sure to negotiate the price

Name: Paritosh1521
Title: Majestic
Review: Though entry was not allowed inside the structure, it is quite and impressive piece of historical Architecture

Name: Aniruddh A
Title: Beauty at it's best! Non-muslims not allowed
Review: visited this place in the afternoon and mesmerised by the exteriors! coudn't really get in though as the rules allow only Muslims to enter! Fair though as a rule is a rule! can be there outside for a glimpse of the architecture! :)

Name: indianlady
Title: Non muslims not allowed
Review: Its a beautiful mosque from the outside with a serene calm surrounding. This is rather uncommon since places of worship are always crowded in India. However on is not allowed to even step onto the structure around the mosque as a non-Namazi.

Name: kp_vy
Title: OK
Review: Have to take cycle rickshaw , through the by lanes as parking is very difficult near the mosque . Nothing much and they charge 300Re for cameras. Can be skipped
